typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RunSeqNo as integer (-1)
}
source(output(
		Period as date,
		Product as string,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		Currency as string,
		{Units Sold} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source
source(output(
		FromCurrency as string,
		ToCurrency as string,
		Date as date,
		ExchangeRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'sampledata',
	folderPath: 'azure-data-factory-by-example-main/SampleData',
	fileName: 'ExchangeRates.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sheet1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> ExchangeRates
Source filter(Product != 'Month Total') ~> ExcludeMonthlyTotal
ExchangeRates filter(ToCurrency == 'USD') ~> RatesToUSD
ExcludeMonthlyTotal, RatesToUSD lookup(Currency == FromCurrency
	&& Period == Date,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ConvertToUSD
ConvertToUSD derive(SalesValueUSD = toDecimal({Unit Price}*{Units Sold}*ExchangeRate),
		Retailer = "Jolly Good Ltd",
		RunSeqNo = toInteger($RunSeqNo)) ~> DerivedSalesValueUSD
DerivedSalesValueUSD select(mapColumn(
		SalesMonth = Period,
		Product,
		UnitsSold = {Units Sold},
		SalesValueUSD,
		Retailer,
		RunSeqNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PrepareOutputSchema
PrepareOutputSchema sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		ManufacturerProductCode as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(18,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		SourceFileName as string,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Retailer,
		SalesMonth,
		Product,
		SalesValueUSD,
		UnitsSold,
		RunSeqNo
	)) ~> Destination
